name: Pro Yaky? GG League
description: Playing the traditional rules of baseball, this game features an Open Mode for solo play, a Versus Mode to play a single match against the CPU or second player and a Pennant Race, which consists of national teams at the time of development. The player can also view the Players Data and custom edit the teams. The game takes place in one of three stadium types of the player's choice. During game play, the player takes the role of a batter to hit the ball and do a home run.
